author: Inside Edition
description: Teacher Abby Zwerner sued the former assistant principal, Ebony Parker, at her school claiming that she failed to act after four people told her Zwerner's 6-year-old student had brought a gun to school. The jurors deliberated for more than five hours before finding for the teacher and awarded her $10 million. Zwerner's lawyers spoke outside the court. Attorneys for the assistant principal said no one could have foreseen that a 6-year-old would bring a firearm to school.
title: Jury Awards Virginia Teacher Shot By 6-Year-Old Student $10 Million

author: Inside Edition
description: As SNAP benefits are imperiled and frozen due to the government shutdown, people are finding and creating new ways to help their neighbors – like acting as a so-called "Grocery Buddy."
title: 'Grocery Buddies' Are Stepping In To Help Feed Their Neighbors #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: Climber Derek Strittmatter fell in Yosemite National Park, shattering his arm and hitting his head against the rocks, and became trapped on a cliff 2,000 feet up. A helicopter dropped rescuer Jesse McGahey on the cliff. He strapped Strittmatter into a stretcher so that he could be flown off the mountain. Strittmatter says he knows how lucky he is to have survived. Last month, famous climber Balin Miller lost his life in a fall at El Capitan. Inside Edition reunited Strittmatter and his rescuer.
title: Climber Saved In High-Risk Rescue Mission After Fall At Yosemite

author: Inside Edition
description: Nia Sioux, was just 9 years old when she first appeared on "Dance Moms." Sioux is now 24 and recounting her seven seasons on the hit Lifetime TV show in her new memoir "Bottom of the Pyramid." Her most painful memories are when she claims Abby Lee Miller made insensitive comments about her race. Miller did not respond to Inside Edition’s request for comment but in the past has apologized for making comments people found hurtful, particularly she said, to the black community.
title: Nia Sioux of 'Dance Moms' Recounts Painful Memories In New Memoir

author: Inside Edition
description: TV's first Golden Bachelor and the woman he married on live TV got a divorce three months later. Theresa Nist is fighting back against ex-husband Gerry Turner after his release of a new tell-all book "Golden Years." In it, Turner alleges that Nist only wanted to "hobnob with the richest and most influential people." In a podcast, Nist said Turner made a "bizarre" comment about killing her and chopping up her body. In the book, Turner claims Nist made him sleep on the couch.
title: Theresa Nist Responds After 1st Golden Bachelor Gerry Turner's Memoir

author: Inside Edition
description: There's international uproar after Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum was groped in public. Each day, thousands of women suffer the silent indignity of getting groped in public. Inside Edition conducted a spot survey. More than 100 women filled out a questionnaire. 19% of women say they have been groped or inappropriately touched on the subway. Only two say they reported the incident to police. Former NYPD detective David Sarni showed Inside Edition what to do if a groper comes close.
title: Tips On What To Do If A Groper Comes Close

author: Inside Edition
description: England's Henry Aldridge & Son is helping auction a collection of items from Frederick Sutton, a first class passenger on the doomed ocean liner. Sutton's effects include a canvas bag, in which a First Class passenger list was recently discovered.
title: Rare Copy Of Titanic First Class Passenger List Discovered In Canvas Bag #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: A cat seemed to have a lot of fun playing with this mouse, but the mouse probably wasn't having a great time. Video of the encounter was captured in Northern Turkey. The cat, to its credit, has incredible hunting skills, trapping the mouse and walking around with it in its teeth, showing off the catch. It doesn't savor the victory for too long, releasing the mouse, letting it think it has an opportunity to get away. Inside Edition Digital’s Mara Montalbano has more.
title: Cat Terrorizes Mouse During Sinister Game Of Catch And Release

author: Inside Edition
description: A police officer chasing a shoplifting suspect got unexpected help from a good Samaritan — a mother of three taking a break from shopping. Inside Edition spoke with Lesli Smith and Sgt. Jeffrey Kahrs after she was honored by police in Slidell, Louisiana.
title: Woman Offers Car To Cops Chasing Suspect #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: The NFL legend revealed that his dog Lua, who died in 2023, now has a clone named Junie.
title: Tom Brady Getting Flak For Cloning His Dog #shorts
